description: Bolton Wanderers midfielder Keith Andrews joins MK Dons on loan after his stint with Watford is cut short.
title: Transfer Deadline Day: Keith Andrews returns to MK Dons
title_page: Transfer Deadline Day: Keith Andrews returns to MK Dons - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bolton Wanderers midfielder Keith Andrews has joined MK Dons on loan until the end of the season after his stint with Watford was cut short.
The 34-year-old joined Watford on loan in the summer and has since made 11 appearances, scoring once.
After starting his career at Wolves, Andrews moved to Hull before his first spell at MK Dons, where he won League Two and the Football League Trophy.
He then made a Â£1.3m move to Blackburn in August 2008.
Republic of Ireland international Andrews joined West Bromwich Albion for a five-month spell from January 2012 and made the move to Bolton in the summer of the same year.
